thread.section_title: Le General Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Boutique Hotel with loads of charm
thread.title_full: Boutique Hotel with loads of charm - Review of Le General Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: CarolandRogerNZ
title: Boutique Hotel with loads of charm
text: Great place to stay. The staff were friendly and helpful - their English excellent and helpful for us Kiwis! Loved the clever use of space and colour in the rooms and in the downstairs. It is a good location for wandering the streets and enjoying the essence of Parid
